data.persona: I am tourist visiting another kingdom. I come from afar. I have visited the docks and shipyard.
data.description:
You are in the Stonehenge.
Technical and advanced, the enormous stones stand looking as if they are placed on top of each other by divine design. The green grass is a stark contrast to the gray stones hovering in the distance.
There's a stone and a green grass here.
The mourner is here.

You are carrying a coin purse and a bag, and wearing a boot.

data.short_motivation: I want to keep the handkerchief as souvenir
data.mid_motivation: I want to give the handkerchief as a gift to my crush
data.long_motivation: I want to develop romantic relationship with my crush

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: put the handkerchief on a gift box

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: go my home country to contact my crush.
